Class User

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.bookings.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionCapable
public class User extends Object implements ActionCapable

User class

User represents a specific user in the system

04/04/2024

    • displayBookedVehicles

      public boolean removeBooking(Booking booking)
      This method removes a particular booking in the booking list
      Parameters:
      booking -
      Returns:
      a boolean value; true or false if the remove booking action is valid

    • confirmBookings

      public double confirmBookings()
      Adds the costs of each booked vehicle and calculates total cost for confirmed booking. The booked list is also cleared
      Returns:
      a double value representing the total price of all booked vehicles

    • allowableActions

      public List<Action> allowableActions()
      allowableActions explicitly indicates the list of actions that can be generated by the user class
      Specified by:
      allowableActions in interface ActionCapable
      Returns:
      a list of actions the User is capable of implementing
